1.Name: 林思彤
1.GradSchool: 柏克萊加州大學 材料科學與工程碩士
1.SelfIntro:
Hi. I am Szu-Tung Lin. I am currently completing my bachelor's degree in Interdisciplinary Program of Nuclear Science at National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan, specializing in 能源環境 and 材料. After graduating in June 2023, I will pursue a master's program in 材料.
I am looking forward to taking on new adventures in the future.
1.Club: 清華大學科學服務社、原子科學院學士班系學會
1.Experience:
Activities Officer of Interdisciplinary Program of Nuclear Science Association     Sep 2021- Jan 2022
• Successfully organized activities, including a spring party and a student competition
Social Media Officer of National Tsing Hua University Science Service Club      Feb 2020- Jun 2020
• Held science camps for senior high school students for winter and summer vacations
• Operated a fan page to promote activities




the Fung Excellence Award and Opportunity
Grant                                                                                         Apr 2023
Independent Study Award of Interdisciplinary Program of Nuclear Science (3rd)                                                                    Sep 2022
The 3rd Innovative Project Award of The College of Nuclear Science (3rd)                                                                                    Oct 2021
Outstanding Academic Performance                                      2021

Special experience in College of Nuclear Science:
The interdisciplinary program has trained us to propose different opinions and communicate with people having diverse specialties. We can propound problems that society faces and solve them. For instance, we found that people in Hsinchu ignore skin protection because they are unaware of the dangers of ultraviolet rays. Therefore, we told our idea to Professor Tsung-Kuang Yeh and got his support. We designed a set of "instant detection," "easy to operate and carry," " energy saving," and "Environmentally friendly" ultraviolet detection devices. Our team members came from different specialties, and we experienced the stage of the product from scratch, including designing the circuit, conducting a market analysis, and making a video for this product. Finally, we completed it through trials and revisions and won third place in the 3rd Innovative Project Award of The College of Nuclear Science, National Tsing Hua University.
1.Hobbies: KPOP (especially BLACKPINK and LE SSERAFIM), Travel

8.Name: 江明婕
8.Quote: 親愛的同班同學，畢業快樂！祝福你們未來充滿希望和成功。謝謝你們陪伴我們走過四年的時光，無論將來何處相逢，我們的友誼永不褪色。祝福你們追求夢想，達成目標。前程萬里，再見不再離別！來自chatgpt的祝福
8.SelfIntro: 雖然個性內向慢熟，但還是很開心能在大學期間認識大家！祝大家鵬程萬里，一帆風順，步步高升，天天黑皮，友情可貴，勿忘我><

9.Name: 陳譽
9.Quote: 很開心在大學四年認識大家，祝福所有原科的同學在未來都能夠順利達成自己的目標、做自己喜歡的事情，大家畢業快樂！
9.SelfIntro: 我是陳譽，今天就要從原科院學士班畢業了，對於能夠畢業相當興奮，雖然未來還是會繼續待在清大就讀研究所，但想到要離開待了四年的地方還是多少有點感傷，未來如果有機會，希望能夠舉辦個同學會，大家一起吃飯！
